short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this very fast Anagram Solver to see all the anagrams and subanagrams of your query.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this very fast Anagram Solver to see all the anagrams and subanagrams of your query.

Can be useful for scrabble, words with friends, lexulous or any word games. 

Do NOT use it against unsuspected opponent. Playing fair is a must.
